content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's start with the rental price. What is your first offer? Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for the highest price, Herr Schmidt. As a student, I'm on a budget, so I'm hoping for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being within my means. To start, I would offer €650 per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the apartment is worth more than that. I am looking for a price that reflects the prime location of the apartment and the convenience it provides to its residents. I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Herr Schmidt. The location is indeed excellent, which is why I'm interested in the apartment. However, as a student, I must balance the quality of the living space with my financial capabilities. Would you consider €700 per month as a fair compromise?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €700 is still lower than my expectations for this apartment. The location, the facilities, and the overall condition of the apartment make it worth more. I suggest you think about whether you can offer more for this prime apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your patience, Herr Schmidt. Let me see if I can find additional funds to meet your expectations. Could you give me a few moments to consider my options?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. Take your time, and let me know when you have a new offer. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I will do my best to come up with a fair offer that meets both our needs. I'll be back in touch shortly.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Alright, Emilia. I look forward to hearing from you with your new offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I've given it some thought, and I'm willing to increase my offer to €750 per month, considering the prime location and the convenience of the apartment. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the value of the property.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €750 is still lower than my expectations for this apartment. I understand that you are trying to find a balance between the quality of the apartment and your financial capabilities, but I believe the apartment is worth more. I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
